gpt_comment: A full day of sunshine is expected in Paris with a comfortable average temperature of 26.2°C, peaking at 30°C and dipping to 21°C. The wind will maintain a gentle breeze at 9mph. It's a perfect day for an outdoor picnic, just remember to keep your baguettes away from any monkeys at the park!
